channel.title: Comments on: Irish Internet Association – Net Visionary Awards

item.title: By: brianomalley
item.dc:creator: brianomalley
item.description: I would like to add to endorse Jonathan's comment! Fergus was the first person I heard mention Web 2.0. His passion for it is infectious and his dedication to seeing Ireland leverage it is hugely admirable - well done!!
item.content:encoded: I would like to add to endorse Jonathan’s comment! Fergus was the first person I heard mention Web 2.0. His passion for it is infectious and his dedication to seeing Ireland leverage it is hugely admirable – well done!!

item.title: By: Jonathan
item.dc:creator: Jonathan
item.description: Well done Fergus! It's about time you received some recognition for all of your hard work for the web2 community in Ireland. Congrats to all the other winners as well.
item.content:encoded: Well done Fergus! It’s about time you received some recognition for all of your hard work for the web2 community in Ireland. Congrats to all the other winners as well.
